bioAsHtml: Michael Wiedeking is Founder and CEO of MATHEMA, a German software consulting company. He is a Java enthusiast and especially proud to have been the first Java trainer in Germany. Michael is founder of the JUG Metropolian Area Nuremberg, "collects" programming languages, and likes to study their design and implementation.

acceptedTalks.title: Looking good: Typography and programming languages
Looking good: Typography and programming languages

bio: Michael Wiedeking is Founder and CEO of MATHEMA, a German software consulting company. He is a Java enthusiast and especially proud to have been the first Java trainer in Germany. Michael is founder of the JUG Metropolian Area Nuremberg, "collects" programming languages, and likes to study their design and implementation.
